column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The very long wait was well worth it. I've never had pizza like this before
column2: and i'm not sure I will again
column3: until I visit Chicago next. I appreciated them having NBA on the TV too
column4: although it was a date night
column5: my wife knew an important game was on and didn't mind my odd glance at the TV here or there.
